item.title: Robert Redford, Golden Boy of Hollywood, Dies at 89
item.description: The Oscar winner and Sundance founder died Sept. 16 at his home in Utah.

item.title: Robert Redford, Golden Boy of Hollywood, Dies at 89
item.description: The Oscar winner and Sundance founder died Sept. 16 at his home in Utah.

item.title: Oscar Doc Winner Daniel Roher Reveals “Secret Weapon” While Directing Narrative Debut ‘Tuner’
item.description: The director of ‘Navalny’ opens up about how he broke out of a creative “depression,” working with Dustin Hoffman and why he’s no longer just “this young guy from Toronto.”

item.title: Oscar Doc Winner Daniel Roher Reveals “Secret Weapon” While Directing Narrative Debut ‘Tuner’
item.description: The director of ‘Navalny’ opens up about how he broke out of a creative “depression,” working with Dustin Hoffman and why he’s no longer just “this young guy from Toronto.”
